title: Stack overflow on sync after hard restart
body:
#### System information
erigon version 2022.08.2-alpha-35c4faa1
Ubuntu 20.04.4 LTS

#### Actual behaviour
fatal error: stack overflow

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
**hard stop sync and then start it again**
./erigon --prune htc --datadir=/blockchain --chain=mainnet --metrics --private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:9091

if nothing helps - try: `./build/bin/downloader  --datadir=/blockchain`
